group_1.textLeft: Charu, you woke up?

group_1.textRight: Shizuka! Thank goodness you're safe!

group_1.textLeft: Given what you just said, I suppose all of that was @real.
How I almost sank to the bottom of the river, @how you purified my Jewel...

group_1.textRight: Does that hurt?

group_1.textLeft: Ihhur's...

group_1.textRight: Then this is real, not a dream.@That's the rule, after all!

group_1.textLeft: Seems so.

group_1.textRight: But, where are we...?

group_1.textLeft: I don't know either. I'm sure that we're alive, @though...

group_1.textRight: This is a girl's room, right?

group_1.textLeft: It could also be an afterlife that's simply disguised as @a girl's room?

group_1.textRight: Noooo, no way! C'mon, let's at least agree that we're alive.

group_1.textLeft: Sunao.
It's Sunao!

group_1.textRight: And this is my home.

group_1.textLeft: So Sunao must have saved us!

group_1.textRight: ...Yes, I did.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you!
I would like to express my gratitude too. Thank you very much.

group_1.textRight: Mm-hm...

group_1.textLeft: Sunao, you're acting a little weird...

group_1.textRight: I could say the same of you two. You came floating down the river, of all places.

group_1.textLeft: If you put it that way...

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry. I didn't. I didn't save you at all...
In fact, I attempted to kill you...

group_1.textLeft: Huh? What are you talking about...?

group_1.textRight: For now, could we just take a moment to talk things over?
I have quite a lot to tell you, and quite a lot I'd like to ask.
I've prepared breakfast as well.

group_1.textLeft: I don't feel like eating anything...
...Sunao was going to...?
Sunao...
Is what you said a few minutes ago true...?

group_1.textRight: Yes...
It's true that I attempted to kill you both.

group_1.textLeft: But why...? I don't understand!

group_1.textRight: My role is to eliminate anyone who goes against the village's will...
Therefore, I was attempting to kill you. @Mainly...Charu...

group_1.textLeft: Me...

group_1.textRight: If Charu wavered over the contract or said she @wanted to go back...
Tried to eliminate the holy Wavering Deity...
Or went deep into the shrine's central building...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]――?!

group_1.textRight: I certainly didn't expect you to come floating down @the river with Shizuka,
but there were many times when you met the conditions that Lady Mikoshiba gave me.
But Charu narrowly escaped from those moments.
Because of Shizuka's intervention...

group_1.textLeft: In short, Sunao is Mikoshiba's pawn...
An assassin that executes those who go against @her will.
So you targeted Charu, because she went against Mikoshiba's expectations, and me, because I tried to protect her.

group_1.textRight: Yes...

group_1.textLeft: So you were her hunting dog...? I can't bring myself @to believe this...

group_1.textRight: But, it's the truth...
I didn't want to do it either.
I thought of the two of you as friends, so I swear @I didn't want to hurt you.
But something unexpected happened...
Charu became sensitive to some sort of mysterious scent,
and Shizuka tried to protect her, which raised Lady Mikoshiba's suspicions...

group_1.textLeft: But you didn't kill us.
You didn't. You helped us, Sunao.
Why is that...?

group_1.textRight: I heard what Shizuka said beside the river, and that stopped me from going through with it...

group_1.textLeft: What did I say...?

group_1.textRight: You said... "I'm going to be another corpse down in those waters."
